## Description {#details}

An individual increment in a Chain of IV increments.

Relate an IV user to an expression that computes the IV it uses from the IV used by the previous link in the Chain.

For the head of a chain, IncExpr holds the absolute <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expression for the original IVOperand. The head of the chain&#39;s IVOperand is only valid during chain collection, before LSR replaces IV users. During chain generation, IncExpr can be used to find the new IVOperand that computes the same expression.

Definition at line 2082 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopstrengthreduce-cpp">LoopStrengthReduce.cpp</a>.
